docs.snippet: It’s not simply for Hillary Clinton. It’s for an optimism and a set of values at the very core of his own story....
docs.lead_paragraph: It’s not simply for Hillary Clinton. It’s for an optimism and a set of values at the very core of his own story.
docs.abstract: Frank Bruni Op-Ed column asserts that, in campaigning for Hillary Clinton, Pres Obama is defending values, including embrace of difference, he has espoused during his presidency; holds Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump represents antithesis of Obama and his openness to outsiders and argues Trump win would erode years of progress.
